mapper.sql: t.id as t_id, t.code as t_code, t.price as t_price, t.move_id as t_move_id, t.create_time as t_create_time, t.order_state as t_order_state, t.pay_state as t_pay_state, t.disco_id as t_disco_id
mapper.insert: insert into order (id, code, price, move_id, create_time, order_state, pay_state, disco_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{moveId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{discoId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into order
id,
code,
price,
move_id,
create_time,
order_state,
pay_state,
disco_id,

mapper.update:
update order
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
move_id = #{moveId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
order_state = #{orderState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_state = #{payState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
disco_id = #{discoId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update order set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, move_id = #{moveId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_state = #{orderState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_state = #{payState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, disco_id = #{discoId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
